name: Morgan
coverLetter:
Been trimming for 4 years. I Can  trim 2-3 pounds a day. I regularly trim in colorado, but  im looking  for a more fast paced, higher payin, trim job in the industry. 
Looking for a place i can camp  out & stay for an extended  amount  of time. I have my own supplies. 
Fast, quiet, clean, & respectful. I am always open to constructive criticism  & bettering my skills. 
Willing to help with  anything. 
Im also a massage  therapist  that does cbd/thc infused massages  for any healing  needs.
I am very fun to be around & easy going.
